action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the pillow in the freezer, the broom on the bed and the plate on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a kitchen and a broom closet here.
You are in a living room now. There are a chair, a book, a couch, a shelf and a side table. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a bedroom and a hallway here.
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a bed, a table and a wardrobe. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.
You take the pillow. In your inventory you have a pillow and a book.
You are in a living room now. There are a chair, a couch, a shelf and a side table. There are passages to a bedroom and a hallway here.
You can't see a freezer here.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
There is nothing on the shelf.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a kitchen and a broom closet here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a hallway and a pantry here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You can't see a shelf here.

You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You can't see a shelf here.
